title: Malaysia's central bank announces stablecoin, tokenization sandbox
snippet: The pilot programs explore wholesale settlement between institutions and real-world use cases, along with stablecoin development and tokenized bank deposits.

title: UK FCA seeks to block Justin Sun-linked HTX after alleged breaches of crypto marketing rules
snippet: The FCA has escalated enforcement against HTX, launching legal action over alleged illegal crypto promotions to UK consumers.

title: BlackRock enters DeFi, taps Uniswap for institutional token trading
snippet: BlackRock is bringing its $2.1 billion tokenized Treasury fund to Uniswap, expanding institutional access to DeFi and deepening Wall Street’s push into onchain finance.

title: Democratic lawmakers slam SEC Chair Atkins over crypto enforcement
snippet: A House Committee on Financial Services hearing on Wednesday dredged up concerns about the pro-crypto regulatory shift under the Trump administration.

title: Democrats press SEC’s Atkins over dropped crypto cases, Trump industry ties as agency shifts strategy

title: Chainlink feeds go live for Ondo tokenized US stocks on Ethereum

title: Ondo and Securitize execs say utility, not hype, will drive tokenization’s next phase
NCUA proposes rules for permitted stablecoin issuers
snippet: Today, the National Credit Union Administration (NCUA) announced a Notice of Proposed Rule Making outlining the framework for applicants seeking NCUA approval to become a permitted payment stablecoin issuer, as outlined in the GENIUS Act.

title: Franklin Templeton, Binance allow tokenized MMFs as off-exchange collateral
snippet: Franklin Templeton is letting institutions pledge tokenized money market fund shares as collateral for trading on Binance, while keeping the fund assets in off‑exchange custody.

title: Danske Bank Offers Bitcoin, Ethereum ETPs to Investors, Ending Eight-Year Crypto 'Ban'
snippet: Denmark’s largest bank is ending an eight-year ‘ban’ on crypto services in response to growing customer demand and improved regulation.
